trait.name: Salt Sensitivity
entries: A pound of salt thrown onto the snail's skin deals {@dice 1d6} acid damage to the creature.

trait.name: Magical Properties
entries: A creature that uses an action to touch the living snail gains 6 temporary hit points that last for 24 hours. Any creature or object that touches the living snail also gains the benefit of a {@spell remove curse} spell. The snail loses these magical properties if it dies.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The snail can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
